Hero.subtitle: Become a Grim Reaper or a Shaman, and fend off the pouring evil spirits. Fast-paced roguelike action based on Joseon folklore.

Lore.text: Every night when the moon bleeds red across the Eight Provinces of Joseon, vengeful spirits and yōkai begin to run rampant. A tragic shaman who rejected heaven's mandate, and a grim reaper who defied the logic of the underworld. Two exorcists embark on a desperate journey of survival and exorcism, staking their own destinies.

Features.title: Endless Swarms of
Features.desc: A desperate battle for survival against evil spirits from Korean folklore

item1.title: Diverse Yōkai and Bosses
item1.desc: Dokkaebi, Gumiho, Grim Reapers, and Chang-gwi. Familiar yet bizarre monsters of Joseon attack you at every moment.

item2.title: Shamanic Action
item2.desc: Fox fire, Jakdu (straw cutter), Moktak (wooden block), and Talismans. Evolve and combine the unique weapons of the Shaman and Reaper.

item3.title: Mysterious Artifact System
item3.desc: Acquire national treasure-class artifacts like the Cheonmachong Gold Crown, Hahoetal mask, and White Porcelain Moon Jar to unleash unimaginable synergies.

shaman.heading: The Channeled
shaman.name: Shaman
shaman.desc: A specialist in exorcism who wields purifying water and talismans, summoning fox fire to burn enemies in a wide area.

reaper.heading: The Defiant
reaper.name: Reaper
reaper.desc: An executor of souls who wields the scythe of karma and the sword of the dead, outputting explosive firepower in close combat.
